snippet.title: Max Mustard Official Trailer
snippet.description:
NOW available on Meta Quest:
https://www.meta.com/experiences/5269080709783454/

Coming to PSVR2 and PCVR: Q2 2024
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/922490/Max_Mustard/

Max Mustard is a made-for-VR platformer with a focus on quality gameplay. 

Each of the 40 hand crafted levels are their own adventure with exhilarating surprises and unique mechanics. No boring bits! It’s the perfect combination of first-person power-ups and classic third-person platforming. Max Mustard is a VR game that players find impossible to put down.


Upgrade your abilities!
What will you spend your coins on at the shop? More speed? The dash attack? More health? Or... Invest it for even more coins?

Story
Your mudpup pals are being caged up and sold as vanity products to the super rich. You and Max Mustard team up to track them down and lead them back to their parents. On your way you’ll circumnavigate a giant skyring filled with obstacles, enemies, surprises and beautiful vistas.
